title: Viper's Creed
synopsis: The story revolves around the members of a private military company (PMC), and the uneasy tension between them and the regular military after a war that caused massive environmental destruction.
characters: ['Cryde, Saiki', 'Kariya, Sakurako', 'Dilah, Ageha', "N'Guyen, Norma", 'Doc', 'Shankai, Rudra', 'Chiaki, Ulla', 'Ladd, Chris', 'Meneau, Jill', 'Zaliche']
